item.title: 50m Giveaway: Pick # 1-100
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Competitions over, no point in this staying open to gather spam. On a side note though, if you intend on running competitions/giveaways in future then I’d recommend that you follow through with them and don’t change the terms and conditions mid-way through. It’ll avoid future conflicts and mistrust.

Read full topic

item.title: 50m Giveaway: Pick # 1-100
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:56, topic:512926”]whats suspicious is how your all still whining after travas won.

no, he didn’t receive the full 50m, because I cancelled the giveaway because people were whining about the rules. then I decided I might as well give the winner a little something, so I gave him 10m.[/quote]

1 person asked you a question and then you started crying for some odd reason. Clearly you didn’t want to give the whole amount away in the first place which is why you “canceled” and then decided to give away some of it so it didn’t look so bad. Was also posted on 1st April.
